excerpt: "While NLP has only seemingly emerged in recent years, its history roots back to the 1950s when Alan Turing introduced the concept of the \"Turing test\" in an article titled \"Intelligence.\" This test has since become widely recognized as a benchmark for assessing  AI's capacity for human-like intelligence, including linguistic capabilities."
